title: Pecker and Howard Remove Trump Files from Safe Before Inauguration
summary: David Pecker and Dylan Howard remove remaining Trump documents from National Enquirer safe weeks before inauguration, fearing liability, either destroying or relocating files

sources.title: National Enquirer removed Trump secrets before inauguration
Enquirer's safe held damaging Trump stories

notes: Second wave of document handling after November shredding. Files found missing from master list later. Fear of legal exposure with Trump becoming president. Trump thanked Pecker for handling situations at Trump Tower meeting.
